title: Miss Mrs and Myths (TEFC)
subject_group: Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Gender identity - Social aspects
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sexual division of labor
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Women - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Equal pay for equal work
description: This program looks closely at the wide range of myths and attitudes of contemporary society toward women as members of the workforce. The historical precedents for current attitudes are revealed, and facts, opinions and testimonies are presented to counter the claims of myths.  Originally produced: Adelaide : Open College of Further Education, 1979. Women as workers (Miss, Mrs, myths) producer, Kay Hannaford ; script, Cate Kelly and Kay Hannaford.
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MOV file H264; Digital Access Copy
